00098 template <typename TYPE>
00099 void AutoDelete<TYPE>::Delete()
00100 {
00101     if ( pObject != (TYPE*)NULL )
00102     {
00103         delete pObject;
00104         pObject = (TYPE*)NULL;
00105     }
00106 }
